title: capsules
body: i reached level 42 and it didn"t give me a capsule. did this happen to anyone else

replies.body: Yea that's definitely not intentional xD! I've double checked and can see you still haven't gotten that level 42 capsule. I've got that added for you, so be sure to refresh your loot if you don't immediately see it.
Same problem for me, no capsule from lv 36-37. I was going to send a support ticket but I don't know what category this would be classified as...
I had the same problem, but it was levels 35 to 36, can you please check it for me?
Same issue with me going level 33 to level 34... {{sticker:cass-cry}}
Same with me and the guys in this thread: boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/9m0Nlktw-did-not-receive-capsule-for-level-up
it happened to me from lv 35 to lv 36 about 10 min ago
Same issue here, just hit 42 with no capsule drop
work so hard just to get nothing
